channel.title: Hosting a Site and a Private Server with my Dedicated Server!
channel.description:
[U]Specs[/U]
[ul][*]4GB RAM [*]355GB disc [*]Dual processor (2.40GHz)[/ul]
[U]Windows Experience Ratings[/U]
[ul][*]Processor: 5.9 [*]RAM: 5.5 [*]Primary hard disk: 5.9[/ul]
The dedicated part means that NO ONE ELSE will be using the service you are buying.
[U]Services Available and Cost[/U]
[ul][*]Dedicated private server hosting (obviously 1 spot open): $20/month [*]Dedicated site hosting (obviously 1 spot open): $10/month[/ul]
[I]Both services include support whenever I'm on.[/I] [I]You can easily connect to both services through your own FTP account that is hosted by the dedicated server.[/I] [I]The dedicated server uses Windows, the best OS for this.[/I] [I]Includes an option of a No-IP domain name.[/I]
[u]Try out the speed of the dedicated server with SMF here[/u]: http://ancientscape.servegame.com/ [b](this link will not be 24/7 until I find a client)[/b]
Post if you're interested.

item.title: Hosting a Site and a Private Server with my Dedicated Server!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Nets8:

Try out the speed of the dedicated server with SMF here: http://ancientscape.servegame.com/ (this link will not be 24/7 until I find a client)

Damn, thats fast. 1 minute in and still nothing shows up on the page… Oh wait! Here it is “Network error”

Not very stable.

And I am sure a rule states that there is to be no selling things with the exception of scar scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting a Site and a Private Server with my Dedicated Server!
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Specs

[ul][]4GB RAM
[]355GB disc
[*]Dual processor (2.40GHz)[/ul]

Windows Experience Ratings

[ul][]Processor: 5.9
[]RAM: 5.5
[*]Primary hard disk: 5.9[/ul]

The dedicated part means that NO ONE ELSE will be using the service you are buying.

Services Available and Cost

[ul][]Dedicated private server hosting (obviously 1 spot open): $20/month
[]Dedicated site hosting (obviously 1 spot open): $10/month[/ul]

Both services include support whenever I’m on.
You can easily connect to both services through your own FTP account that is hosted by the dedicated server.
The dedicated server uses Windows, the best OS for this.
Includes an option of a No-IP domain name.

Try out the speed of the dedicated server with SMF here: http://ancientscape.servegame.com/ (this link will not be 24/7 until I find a client)

Post if you’re interested.
